pages.heading: Iron Tip
pages.text: Increases the damage of fired arrows by 25%. Also stacks with Vanilla enchantments. $(br2)Valid items: Bows, Crossbows.$(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (256 shots)

pages.heading: Iron Tip L
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts four times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (1024 shots)

pages.heading: Iron Tip II
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the damage by 50% instead. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot II (256 shots)

pages.heading: Iron Tip XL
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment lasts sixteen times longer. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot I (4096 shots)

pages.heading: Iron Tip III
pages.text: This upgraded version of the anointment increases the damage by 75% instead. $(br2)Applies: Heavy Shot III (256 shots)
